record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 470

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, it is my understanding that S. 470, introduced by Senator Levin, is at the desk, and I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask for its second reading but object to my own request.
Mr. President, I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
